title: Svyatoslav Zubar
text:
Svyatoslav Zubar (; born 11 February 1993 in <a href="Lviv">Lviv</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>.
Career.
Zubar is a product of the local youth sportive school in his native <a href="Lviv">Lviv</a>. His first trainer was Ruslan Brunets.
He began his career in the amateurs level. Then he spent a one season in the Sweden lower league club <a href="H%C3%A4rn%C3%B6sands%20FF">Härnösands FF</a>. In February 2017 Zubar returned to Ukraine and signed a contract with <a href="FC%20Rukh%20Vynnyky">FC Rukh Vynnyky</a>. He was promoted, together with the team, from the <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a> to the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>.
